thread.title: Larry Holmes
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by Larry Holmes

author: Larry Holmes
title: Larry Holmes
text: After two years use of my Pelican salt free system I am more convinced than ever of the quality and efficacy of the product. No more wear and tear on my washing appliances and no more mineral build up on my plumbing and fixtures. The clear glass shower door needs far less attention and the cleaner feeling after bathing is priceless. My third-party water filters in the refrigerator and under the sink last at least twice as long because of the sediment filter and the softening process. I should have done this sooner.
